regen.absent_element: configuration and application of alert thresholds
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow configuration of alert thresholds and automatically apply these settings to trigger alerts when thresholds are exceeded.
The system shall allow the configuration of alert thresholds for system resource monitoring.

regen.absent_element: configuration and management of alert thresholds
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an interface for configuring and managing alert thresholds for monitoring system resources.
